values.value: The standard EN 10221 is replaced by EN ISO 9443:2018. Confirmation of surface quality class E with ø < 10,0 mm: max. 0,10 mm; 10,0 mm < ø < 20,0 mm: max. 1% from diameter; ø > 20,0 mm: max. 0,20 mm. The additional requirement for a maximal acceptable amount of defective parts (z) mentioned in EN ISO 9443 cannot be applied for untested wire rod.
